Headline: #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Jackson
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive and 4 Cottage Grove buses temp. rerouted SB: Michigan, Adams, State, Ida B. Wells, Michigan; NB: Michigan, Van Buren, State, Jackson, Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Jackson, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Adams, State, Ida B. Wells, and Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Van Buren, State, Jackson, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
